description: This file defines client-side API functions for authentication and game management in a Tic-Tac-Toe platform. It includes functions for login, registration, logout, fetching user profiles, listing games, retrieving specific game data, making moves, creating new games, and fetching game history.

methods.name: export async function apiRequest(path: string, opts: RequestInit = {}, token?: string) { apiRequest
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request to the API with optional authentication token.

methods.name: authApi.login
methods.description: Logs in a user with username and password.

methods.name: authApi.register
methods.description: Registers a new user with username and password.

methods.name: authApi.logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user using the provided token.

methods.name: authApi.getProfile
methods.description: Fetches the profile information of the current user.

methods.name: gameApi.listGames
methods.description: Retrieves a list of available games for the user.

methods.name: gameApi.getGame
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific game by its ID.

methods.name: gameApi.makeMove
methods.description: Makes a move in a specific game at a given position.

methods.name: gameApi.createGame
methods.description: Creates a new game, optionally against a specific opponent.

methods.name: gameApi.getHistory
methods.description: Fetches the game history for the current user.

ctags.name: apiRequest
ctags.pattern: /^export async function apiRequest(path: string, opts: RequestInit = {}, token?: string) {$/
